title: The Contractor of the Great Spirit – Offering of the Evil God, to The Strongest Adventurer~ - Novel Updates
tags: Abandoned Children   Contracts   Fantasy World   Male Protagonist   Spirit Users   Spirits
author: Nekoko   猫子
description:
In a remote village, there exists a custom of sacrificing a child with high level of Mana to an Evil God once every hundred years. Marc, a boy with white hair who is considered to be the 'Devil’s child' who will bring disaster, is destined to be the sacrifice from his birth.

However, it seems that over the years, tradition has become distorted, and the evil god is a great spirit who loves humans.

Mark, who was favored by the Great Spirit Nerodias and became its contractor, chose to leave the village and travel to the outside world.>
